item.title: Subscribe to CVS
item.description: To subscribe to NetGain Cloud Vista SaaS, please contact assistance@netgain-systems.com

item.title: Setting up EM Edge
item.description: This page tells you how to get started with setting up EM Edge agent at your local site. Install requirements Installation steps Starting EM Edge Install requirements EM Edge can run on Linux, Windows or Mac OS. For Linux, recommended OS is Centos 7/8 Recommended minimum specs: Intel i5 1.6MHz CPU, 8GB RAM, 50GB disk space Installation steps Install Java runtime from Java SE Development Kit 8 Downloads page Download and unzip the latest EM Edge software package Starting EM Edge Running EM Edge (OS dependent) Windows: netgain/emedge.
